author: Fextralife
description:
Path of Exile 2 PATCH Incoming - MASSIVE CHANGES to Dodges, Loot and MORE!
In this Path of Exile 2 video, I'm gonna be talking about the the post that GGG released addressing the early access post-launch feedback. Some things in the game are going to be changed, namely dodge rolls, checkpoints, itemization, currency changes, and a couple more things and in this video I want to go through what's changing to the game and what have changed already.

Timestamps
0:00 - Path of Exile 2 Early Access Changes
0:22 - Dodge Roll Changes 
1:23 - Checkpoint Changes
2:15 - Item Changes
3:04 - Rare Monster Changes
3:33 - Currency Changes
3:52 - Map Mod Changes
4:11 - Unlucky Drop Protection
4:51 - Click to Move Issue
5:09 - Missing Rare Endgame Monsters
5:42 - Final Thoughts

Don't forget to like the video and subscribe to our channel for more!

title: Path of Exile 2 PATCH Incoming - MASSIVE CHANGES to Dodges, Loot and MORE!
